name: Avoid The Dots
description:
Avoid the Dots is an addictive reflex-based game where your objective is to avoid colliding with red dots through quick reaction.

You can activate one of several boosts that will aid you in this epic battle against the red dots by picking up the power ups.

Drag your finger anywhere on your screen to move the white dot, no need to drag on top of the your dot. See how long your dot can survive and compete for the highest score!

It is a great pick up and play game especially for children and younger players which will test their reaction and attentiveness, as well as help to improve their hand-eye coordination.

· One-touch control system!
· Simple and addictive gameplay!
. Game Center challenges!
. FREE!

If you like idot, idots or sinuous, you will love Avoid the Dots!
